segments.text: Hi , John ! I haven ’ t seen you for ages .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi ! Yes , it ’ s been a long time . I ’ m really glad to see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m glad to see you , too . How ’ Ve you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just fine . How is everything with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not bad . I finally bought a house . It ’ s an old one , but built really solid . It is close to here . Do you want to come over for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like that , but I ’ m flying home this afternoon , and I told my parents I ’ d meet them at the airport for lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , next time you ’ re here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a deal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that you moved to Florida .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ m in Titusville . The space shuttle is launched from near there . I ’ Ve seen a lot of space shuttle launches .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The shuttle launches are beautiful . I saw one that took off at midnight . The whole sky got bright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds great !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m pretty happy living there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to see Disney World , Sea World , Universal Studios , and Weeki-Watchee Springs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been to all of them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m jealous . I ’ Ve never been to Florida .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Sunshine State certainly is worth visiting . Come down for a vacation sometime . I ’ ll take you to Disney World .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds great ! I ’ ll take you up on that invitation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you do . And keep in touch , OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sure will .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here ’ s my business card . Send me an email once in a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Count on it . And here ’ s my card . Don ’ t hesitate to call me anytime .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I ’ d better get going . I don ’ t want to be late for lunch . Mom would worry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m really glad we bumped into each other . Have a good trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take good care of yourself , Mary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bye-bye !
segments.speaker: S2
